strategy.module: GIVE THE PATH OF THE STRATEGY HERE, STRING, e.g., src.strategy.yahan_strategies
strategy.class: GIVE THE CLASS NAME OF THE STRATEGY HERE, STRING, e.g., SMAStrategy

params.symbol: GIVE THE TRADING SYMBOL HERE, STRING, e.g., sh601000
params.params1: GIVE PARAM 1 HERE, e.g., DEPENDS, short_window
params.params2: GIVE PARAM 2 HERE, e.g., DEPENDS, long_window
params.params3: GIVE PARAM 3 HERE, e.g., DEPENDS, qty
ADD ALL STRATEGY PARAMETERS AS NEEDED

portfolio.cash: INITIAL CASH AMOUNT HERE, VALUE, e.g., 1000000
portfolio.commission: GIVE THE COMMISSION RATE HERE, VALUE, e.g., 0.0005
portfolio.slippage: GIVE THE SLIPPAGE RATE HERE, VALUE, e.g., 0.0005
portfolio.start: BACKTEST START DATE HERE, STRING, e.g., 2024-01-01
portfolio.end: BACKTEST END DATE HERE, STRING, e.g., 2025-12-01

data.source: DATA SOURCE HERE, STRING, e.g., akshare
data.symbol: GIVE THE TRADING SYMBOL HERE, STRING, e.g., sh601000
data.interval: GIVE THE DATA INTERVAL HERE, STRING, e.g., 1d
data.cache: SHOULD CACHE DATA, BOOLEAN, e.g., true
data.refresh: SHOULD REFRESH DATA, BOOLEAN, e.g., false
